summary: Vilnius is the capital of Lithuania and a very historic city. It is known for its beautiful old town, which is one of the biggest in Europe and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The city has many Baroque-style buildings, giving it a unique look. Once called "the Jerusalem of Lithuania," Vilnius was an important Jewish center. It has also been recognized as a financial hub and hosted important events like the 2023 NATO Summit. With a population of over 600,000, it is one of the largest cities in the Baltic region.
title: Vilnius
